Title: Mariquina

Actors: Mylene Dizon, Ricky Davao, Bing Pimentel, Che Ramos
Plot: Unlike the former Philippine First Lady, Imelda is indifferent towards shoes. To her, they are fraught with the bittersweet nostalgia of childhood, one that was marred by a difficult ...
